item.title: Troubleshoot A Failed CRUS Session Because Of Unmet Conditions
item.description: Troubleshoot a Failed CRUS Session Because of Unmet Conditions NOTE CRUS was deprecated in CSM 1.2.0 and it will be removed in CSM 1.5.0. See the following links for more information: Rolling Upgrades with BOS V2 Deprecated features If a CRUS session has any unmet conditions, adding or fixing them will cause the session to continue from wherever it got stuck. Updating other parts of the system to meet the required conditions of a CRUS session will unblock the upgrade session.

item.title: Troubleshoot Nodes Failing To Upgrade In A CRUS Session
item.description: Troubleshoot Nodes Failing to Upgrade in a CRUS Session NOTE CRUS was deprecated in CSM 1.2.0 and it will be removed in CSM 1.5.0. See the following links for more information: Rolling Upgrades with BOS V2 Deprecated features Troubleshoot compute nodes failing to upgrade during a Compute Rolling Upgrade Service (CRUS) session and rerun the session on the failed nodes. When nodes are marked as failed they are added to the failed node group associated with the upgrade session, and the nodes are marked as down in the workload manager (WLM).
